| History                 = The '''Imperial Forces''' were an organization of terrorists who were seeking to destroy the US government and replace it with a new class system.{{r|Captain America #194}} In order to achieve this, they created so-called [[Madbomb]]s which caused people to go insane and attack each other. The largest Madbomb, "Big Daddy" was set to go off in time for the bicentennial celebration, affecting the entire United States.{{r|Captain America #193}}

Within the organization people were subjected to various experiments and brainwashing techniques to ensure their continued obedience to the [[Elite (Imperial Forces) (Earth-616)|Elite]],{{r|Captain America #195}} as well as participating in deadly gladiatorial games.{{r|Captain America #196}}

Their plot was foiled by [[Captain America (Steve Rogers)|Captain America]] and the [[Samuel Wilson (Earth-616)|Falcon]] and the Madbombs destroyed.{{r|Captain America #200}}
